author: Rebecca Ruiz
title: Kids are losing their childhood to the coronavirus pandemic. This is what it feels like for them.
description: There are few things more depressing than constantly reminding a young child that she must stay six feet away from a friend she meets on the street during a neighborhood shelter-in-place walk. We're trying to keep everyone healthy, you say. From the coronavir…
content:
There are few things more depressing than constantly reminding a young child that she must stay six feet away from a friend she meets on the street during a neighborhood shelter-in-place walk.
